description: This file implements a Flutter UI screen for managing students in a kindergarten management system. It includes a stateful widget for displaying a list of students, with functionalities to add or delete students, along with a form for inputting new student details.

classes.name: StudentsScreen
classes.description: Main widget displaying the list of students with options to add and delete students.

classes.name: _StudentsScreenState
classes.description: State class managing the list of students and user interactions.

classes.name: _StudentForm
classes.description: Widget presenting a form to enter new student details.

classes.name: _StudentFormState
classes.description: State class managing the student input form logic and validation.

methods.name: initState
methods.description: Initializes the state and fetches the list of students.

methods.name: _reload
methods.description: Reloads the list of students by fetching data again from repository.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the UI of the students list screen.

methods.name: _StudentForm
methods.description: Creates the widget for inputting student data.

methods.name: _StudentFormState
methods.description: Manages the input and validation state of the student form.

methods.name: dispose
methods.description: Disposes of text controllers when form widget is removed.
